fields.description:

comments.body:
Create patch with following changes:
 * Always get filesystem object from the path, instead of storing it.
 * Retry logic when logging fails.
 * Moved the code copied from tez to the tez folders, this is to make sure we can remove this code in a backwards compatible way, when hive moves to next release tez version. SequenceFile writes the key and value class in the file and prevents being read if the class package name is different.

[~anishek], Please review.
